Scene13SpeakerHatThiefPossum: ^Hat-Thief Possum: YEEE-HAHHH! I done gone and lassoed me a pretty little mouse lady!
^Brie: Let me go! I’m not your pretty little mouse lady!
^Hat-thief Possum: My momma says I can have anything I want and I want you pretty little mouse lady!
^Brie: Hey, you! Help me, will ya?!
^Hat-thief Possum: What in tarnation!? Who do we have here? A mousey out to steal my pretty little lady?
^Choose to try and talk the crazy possum down

c-0: ^Darwin: She’s not your lady and that’s not your hat! I won’t back down until you surrender both!
c-1: ^Darwin: II..I think you’ve got it all wrong. I’ve got a sword, but I won’t use it if you give that hat back and let the girl go.
c-2: ^Darwin: Bring it, cowboy wannabe! I’m not scared of a pudgy little possum.

Dovetail: ^Hat Thief: Well since your not pullin’ in your horns, I’ll take ya standing up…or was it I’ll lie down and turn around…ah forget it..Let’s fight!
^Brie: Thanks for helping me out back there, that crystal was really starting to dig into my back!

^Brie: Yeah, it’s been there forever. Nezumi says it has powers and the possums made it angry or something..Well I better get back to Totten Town. My dad must be freaking out by now…thanks again..oh..I didn’t ever get your name..
^Brie: Thanks, again Darwin. Oh, and I’m Brie, by the way.
^Brie: Say Darwin, after you give Ettie his hat back, you should come find my dad and me. I’ll know he’ll want to thank you in person for helping me.
^Brie: Knowing Dad, he’s probably with Nezumi…he always goes to Nezumi when something is wrong…well I’ll see ya later Darwin!
